directions: Combine onion, carrot, celery, pancetta and garlic in heavy large saucepan. Cover and cook over medium-high heat until vegetables are tender, stirring occasionally, about 10 minutes. Add sage; stir 15 seconds. Stir in cannellini, tomatoes with juices and broth. Simmer covered until flavors blend, about 7 minutes. Season with salt and pepper. Transfer to bowl.
ingredients: 2 ounces thinly sliced pancetta or 2 bacon slices, chopped
2 15-ounce cans cannellini (white kidney beans), rinsed, drained
title: White Beans in Tomato Sauce with Sage and Pancetta
